tool.name: Bismark Pretty Report
tool.description: Generates a graphical HTML report page from report outputs of Bismark

section.name: additional_reports
section.title: Additional reports to include in the HTML page (optional)

param.name: dedup
param.label: Submit the corresponding Bismark deduplication report
param.help: Optional output of the module *Bismark Deduplicate*

param.name: splitting
param.label: Submit the corresponding Bismark splitting report
param.help: Optional output of the module *Bismark Methylation Extractor*

param.name: mbias
param.label: Submit the corresponding Bismark M-bias report
param.help: Optional output of the module *Bismark Methylation Extractor*

param.name: nucleotide
param.label: Submit the corresponding Bismark nucleotide report
param.help: Optional output of the module *Bismark Mapping*

param.name: separate_logfile
param.label: Create a separate logfile, otherwise logs are added to the dataset info.

tool.help:
**What it does**
| This tool uses a Bismark alignment report to generate a graphical HTML report page. | Optionally, further reports of the Bismark suite such as deduplication, methylation extractor splitting or M-bias reports can be specified as well.
